attributes.review: Immediately after downloading, my phone started glitching out. I assume itâ€™s that group of ANTIFA TERRORISTS who are harassing true Americans in this nation. I am beginning to believe that this is a FAKE APP set up to trick Republicans like myself into giving away private information, which is being USED AGAINST US!! No doubt has something to do with Sleepy Joe and those insane, communist Democrats! PLEASE do not get this app, and tell everyone you love that this app allows hackers to takeaway your privacy! This trolls are spamming my email and texting app all because I support the GREATEST PRESIDENT the nation has seen. My wonderful, intelligent, and respectful kids have started receiving these messages full of verbal abuse for simply voicing their EXTREMELY VALID opinion that police should be using more force on â€œpeacefulâ€ rioters: police have only acted in self-defense, an institution as pure as iron pyrite would NEVER stray from the path of justice! Even our AMAZING president agrees!! My kids are being told that they are part of the â€œproblemâ€ and that they are racist! THEY EACH HAVE A BLACK FRIEND! Thereâ€™s no way that they could be racist, since they were raised with good, Christian, conservative values and a healthy love for their nation!! I am horrified that anyone would attack teenagers, children, minors for their political stances; it is unacceptable for anyone to be treated so poorly for having the strength to defend their constitutional rights and the injustice that society brings on them. This app needs to be taken down so no more good Americans will have their information exploited, and so that no one will never again be harassed for RESPECTING THEIR PRESIDENT AND GOOD AMERICAN VALUES!! Someone has even stolen our beautiful Trump 2020 sign, which I can assume is because the terrorists used their spies to track me down from the app. Disgusting.
